justification: "CU traits was assessed using the 24-item self-report measure Inventory of Callous-Unemotional Traits (ICU; Frick, 2004)."

measured_by: Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire – Conduct Problem subscale
justification: "The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire (SDQ) was used to assess conduct problems… We used the five-item conduct problem subscale."
"A costly helping behavioral paradigm called the altruistic/antisocial or AlAn's game… was used to assess prosocial behavior."
